name: Above The Waves
description:
Above The Waves is a short point and click adventure game, that tells the tale of a cute octopus with a fascination for the stars.

The game was originally created in two weeks for the 2015 AdventureJam game jam, and an enhanced version is currently being developmed during our spare time. The initial AdventureJam version of the game is available to play for free.

Note that we don't have a lot of time to work on this game at the moment, and so development of the enhanced edition is progressing slowly.
